sentences.sentence: Several days later, I was bringing our garbage bins back from the curb when I noticed an envelope taped to one of the lids.
sentences.translation: 几天后，我把垃圾桶从路边拿回来时，注意到一个盖子上贴着一个信封。

sentences.sentence: The lids of the casserole dishes are designed to double up as baking dishes.
sentences.translation: 这些砂锅盖子的设计使它们可以兼作烤盘。

sentences.sentence: I keep the flour and sugar in individual jars, sealed tight with their glass lids.
sentences.translation: 我把面粉和糖分别放在罐子里，并用玻璃盖密封。
